name: getlearningresources_topic
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool power_bi_smartable.
Tool description: The Power BI API offers the Microsoft Power BI news, learning resources, events, samples and other information.
API description: Fetch Power BI learning resources based on a specific topic and page number.

topic.description: The topic for which to fetch learning resources.

page.description: The page number of the results to retrieve.
